pullRequest.body:
We already have the `LinearEquiv` versions of these.
This also copies the lemmas around the definition

nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by alreadydone.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6928677711/job/18844921860)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6928677711/job/18844922134)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6928677711/job/18844922430)

`inclusion` seems more common in mathlib: [Set.inclusion](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Data/Set/Basic.html#Set.inclusion), [Subring.inclusion](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/RingTheory/Subring/Basic.html#Subring.inclusion), [Subalgebra.inclusion](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Algebra/Algebra/Subalgebra/Basic.html#Subalgebra.inclusion), [Subfield.inclusion](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/FieldTheory/Subfield.html#Subfield.inclusion), [IntermediateField.inclusion](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/FieldTheory/IntermediateField.html#IntermediateField.inclusion) ... maybe we should change `Submodule.ofLe` ...
I've now renamed the one in this PR too.

Here the existing names are more chaotic, and `ofEq` is a reasonable choice:
[Equiv.Set.ofEq](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Logic/Equiv/Set.html#Equiv.Set.ofEq), [LinearEquiv.ofEq](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/LinearAlgebra/Basic.html#LinearEquiv.ofEq), [RingEquiv.subringCongr](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/RingTheory/Subring/Basic.html#RingEquiv.subringCongr), [IntermediateField.equivOfEq](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/FieldTheory/Adjoin.html#IntermediateField.equivOfEq), [Subalgebra.equivOfEq](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Algebra/Algebra/Subalgebra/Basic.html#Subalgebra.equivOfEq)
